annotation.Method: Picked the karar manually from the prominent pitch of the audio recording with 1 cent precision.
annotation.Citation: Salamon, J., & Gomez, E. (2012). Melody extraction from polyphonic music signals using pitch contour characteristics. IEEE Transactions on Audio, Speech, and Language Processing, 20(6), 1759-1770.

audioHistogramMatching.Method: Tonic identification by audio histogram matching given the annotated makam
audioHistogramMatching.Citation: Gedik, A. C., & Bozkurt, B. (2010). Pitch-frequency histogram-based music information retrieval for Turkish music. Signal Processing, 90(4), 1049-1063.

distributionMatching.Method: Tonic identification by matching the pitch distributions computed from the score and audio recording.
distributionMatching.Citation: Senturk, S., Gulati, S., and Serra, X. (2013). Score informed tonic identification for makam music of Turkey. In Proceedings of 14th International Society for Music Information Retrieval Conference (ISMIR), pages 175-180, Curitiba, Brazil.

repetitiveSectionLinking.Citation: Senturk, S., Gulati, S., & Serra, X. Score Informed Tonic Identification for Makam Music of Turkey. In Proceedings of ISMIR, 2013.

firstAndRepetitiveSectionLinking.Citation: Senturk, S., Gulati, S., & Serra, X. Score Informed Tonic Identification for Makam Music of Turkey. In Proceedings of ISMIR, 2013.

scoreInformed.Citation: Senturk, S., Gulati, S., & Serra, X. Score Informed Tonic Identification for Makam Music of Turkey. In Proceedings of ISMIR, 2013.
